title: Did George H.W. Bush says that if Americans know the truth, he will be "connected. "
subtitle: The 41st President of the United States allegedly made the statement in response to a press question about Iran-Contra in 1992, but was unable to obtain documents for a quarter of a century.
author: David Emery
vclaim: George H.W. Bush once said: "If people find out what we've done, we'll hunt down the streets and kill."
